task.title: Getting Started on Ravelry
task.shortdesc: New to Ravelry? Here's how to get started.

context.p: If you're new to Ravelry, the best way to learn is to just jump in and start exploring. On Ravelry, you can track your projects and stash, find new patterns and yarns, and connect with other knitters, crocheters, and spinners.
